file_content.text: Too bad we couldn't mine Vergost for info, but I admit--the galaxy's a better place without him.
Thanks for bringing in Vergost. Kalda'll get him to spill everything he knows.
An extermination factory... how could the Empire do this?
Plug into the mainframe. I'll contact you once I'm patched through.
A non-human who's avoided the Empire's takeover. Most of us don't have that distinction.
Finally, a human not wearing the Imperial uniform. Don't see much else when the Empire's working us to death.
I'm Ganuk. Foreman's my official post, but most of my time's spent organizing the resistance. First the Hutts, now the Empire, you know?
A Jedi's never too busy to aid a friend of the Republic.
It's my duty to help
If you're fighting the Empire, Havoc Squad can probably help.
Trouble with the Imps?
We need help now more than ever.
Seems like the Empire's in everyone's hair these days.
You need a hand?
Sounds like I've found a kindred spirit.
Give me the latest update.
Make it snappy.
I won't waste your time, I--I promise.
There's a chemical plant nearby. Sources say the Empire's designing toxins to kill specific sentient species.
I sent an agent to dig up intel, find out what they're planning--but she's gone missing.
The plant is crawling with Imperial guards, so infiltration's not an option.
I need an assault on the plant, head-on. We need to get into their mainframe, see what the Empire's plotting.
The Empire can't keep any secrets from me. I'll do it.
I'm in.
Glad to have you on board.
Just the challenge I need.
Be careful. Their defenses are strong, even for you.
Find the plant's mainframe. Plug this data scanner in, and I'll get remote access.
We'll find out who exactly the Empire's planning to murder with their chemicals.
Stop begging for favors. Get the information yourself.
You do it. [Refuse quest.]
I can barely walk after a lifetime serving the Empire. If you're out, I don't know what we'll do.
The Empire can't oppress us forever. The Evocii will have their day.
